I get to this point in running the installer and it just stays like that for an indeterminate amount of time, I end up closing it with Task manager because it wont respond to inputs. did the same thing with 1.4 a few days back
I figured it out, my folder protection was crashed and denied every action in the folder. apologies for the wasted post.
